room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: LOVED this one!  It's atmospheric and immersive and totally a great one.  Book it! :)

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: We had a blast here. We did The Cabin. I especially liked the fact that we were only in there with our party and no strangers. The people were nice and made sure to help you with "hints" when you were getting stuck or frustrated. We will definitely be going back.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Awesome escape room!  Our family of 4 made it out of the cabin with 36 seconds to spare.  Great atmosphere and staff helped us when we needed it, keeping to the theme of the room.  Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Did the Cabin in the Woods and it was great! The set was awesome. Staff was great.. loved the vibe! Have been to many escape rooms and this one is our favorite!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Canâ€™t wait to go back. Staff was friendly and informative. The room we went to was a lot of fun and very immersive. Felt like we were actually in a cabin in the woods.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Amazing experience! The staff was so friendly and so much help. The cabin room had me on my toes the entire time. The effects were a great touch. I can't wait to go back and check out the other rooms.
